data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki - Xipha Metal Cover Set: Character Design
data.detailed_description:
This set allows you to change the tactical orbment Xipha's cover to DLC-exclusive designs.

Character Cover: Van
Character Cover: Agnes
Character Cover: Feri
Character Cover: Aaron
Character Cover: Risette
Character Cover: Quatre
Character Cover: Judith
Character Cover: Bellegarde

*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After unlocking items, apply them via [Modify Orbment] in the Orbment Workshop menu.
*Full The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki game (sold separately) required to access this content. Please update and install the most recent patch if necessary.
